question: Which Indian state is set to launch 'Everybody will get employment' scheme?
explanation:
The state of Madhya Pradesh is set to launch the 'Everybody will get employment' scheme through video conferencing.
The scheme has an objective of distributing MNREGA job cards to the labourers of the state. This scheme will focus on providing employment to migrant labourers. The Jhabua district of Madhya Pradesh has launched a new scheme called ‘Didi Vehicle Service’ for rural women for free and safe delivery.
